Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: சிதைவிடத்து ஒல்கார் உரவோர் புதையம்பிற் பட்டுப்பா டூன்றுங் களிறு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The strong minded will not faint, even when all is lost; the elephant stands firm, even when wounded by a shower of arrows.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A magnificent, powerful war elephant ('களிறு') is shown in the midst of a fierce battle. It is grievously wounded, with many arrows sticking out of its hide ('புதையம்பிற் பட்டு').
Layered_Composition.Midground: Despite its wounds and the surrounding chaos of destruction ('சிதைவிடத்து'), the elephant does not collapse or flee. It stands its ground firmly, a tower of strength and resolve ('பாடு ஊன்றும்').
Layered_Composition.Background: In parallel, a strong-minded person ('உரவோர்') is shown amidst the ruins of their life, yet they stand with the same unyielding posture as the elephant, refusing to be broken by adversity ('ஒல்கார்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The strong-willed do not falter in the face of ruin, just as a noble elephant stands its ground even when pierced by a volley of arrows.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The wounded but unyielding elephant is the central, powerful analogy for the resilience of the strong-minded.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: A dramatic, chaotic battlefield lighting with fire and smoke. The elephant is lit heroically, its form strong despite the arrows. The colors are gritty, with the red of wounds and fire.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A low-angle shot that emphasizes the sheer size and unwavering stability of the elephant despite its injuries.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with a focus on the intense details of the battle.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast, dramatic lighting to highlight the elephant's form and wounds.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Epic historical battle scene, wildlife realism.
